visualization_prompt: Generate a spline chart showing monthly temperature variations using chronological categorical axis formatting
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains 12 monthly observations of temperature values (quantitative continuous variable) across categorical time intervals. Synthetic data follows annual cyclical patterns with μ=129.3°F, σ=45.8, demonstrating realistic seasonal variation. The spline chart was selected to emphasize smooth transitions between monthly measurements while maintaining Tufte's data-ink ratio through clean axis styling. Cairo's perceptual principles are applied through color-coded axes (blue temporal, green quantitative) and proportional line weight. Margin adjustments (50px top/bottom, 100px left/right) optimize data density while maintaining legibility of categorical labels.
